import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; // import { Training } from 'src/app/models/training'; import { Training } from 'src/app/enum/training'; import { TrainingService } from 'src/app/services/training/training.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-trainings', templateUrl: './trainings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./trainings.component.css'], }) export class TrainingsComponent implements OnInit { trainings: Training[] = []; constructor(private trainingService: TrainingService) {} ngOnInit() { this.trainingService.getTrainings().subscribe({ next: (data: Training[]) => { this.trainings = data; }, error: (error) => { console.log(error); }, }); } }
